metadata.title: CVE-2024-49571 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/smc: check iparea_offset and ipv6_prefixes_cnt when receiving proposalmsgWhen receiving proposal msg in server, the field iparea_offsetand the field ipv6_prefixes_cnt in proposal msg are from theremote client and can not be fully trusted. Especially thefield iparea_offset, once exceed the max value, there has thechance to access wrong address, and crash may happen.This patch checks iparea_offset and ipv6_prefixes_cnt before using them.
